msContents.summary: This manuscript contains Aṃsa 4, Adhyāya 1-45 of Śivarahasya, But on 1v manuscript says 4th chapter.

msItem.title: Śivarahasya. Aṃsa 4

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 34 pp: 155-160 VOHD II,7 p. 887 entry 2485

msItem.rubric: 1v1 oṃ śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ . śrīsarasvatyai namaḥ . śrīśivāya namaḥ
msItem.incipit:
1v 1 śarvāṇī vadanāravindavikasansuryaprabhaṃ sinduraṃ sindurā
1v 2 ruṇaṃ vaktrapadmamamalaṃ vidhau divajaprabhaṃ . bhaktā naumahayāyya bṛti vilasat gātrai amodaprabhūdaṃ ādyaṃ modakadanta
msItem.explicit: 98r 4 ṇendumykhye padavīṃ kiṃ kāmānābhiḥ paraṃ . tau nādhāṃ karanāmakoyamanulobhaktyā śṛṇodyonaraḥ .
msItem.finalRubric: 98r 5 iti śrīśivarahasye caturthāṃśe pañcatriṃśodhyāyaḥ … hariḥ oṃ sāṃbaśivārpaṇamastu 98r 6 karakṛtamaprādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ . mīnākṣīsomasundareśvābhyānnamaḥ
